description: on {weaponClass} atk, +1 wep dmg until you end a turn having not made such an atk
+1 global dmg while holding a {weaponClass} wep
on boss hit, target gets -1 to $ability saves for combat
while holding a {weaponClass} wep, on displacing 15+' in a single turn, +1d4 {dmgType} dmg to your next {weaponClass} hit
on sub hit, give target -1 phys res until end of your next turn
if you haven't been hit by an adj creature since your last turn, +1 global dmg
while holding a {weaponClass} wep, +1 non-phys dmg
while holding a {weaponClass} wep, +1 DoT dmg
on sub hit, debuff target until end of your next turn with +1 crit range to incoming atks
while holding a {weaponClass} wep, on displacing 15+' in a single turn, +1 non-phys res until your next {weaponClass} hit
if dmg from added dice is 7+ on sub {weaponClass} hit, mark target with -3 {dmgType} res until end of your next turn
if dmg from added dice is 7+ on sub {weaponClass} hit, give target -1 to debuff saves until end of your next turn
if dmg from added dice is 7+ on sub {weaponClass} hit, give target 2 {dmgType} DoT, stacking until DEX save
if you haven't been hit by an adj creature since your last turn, +1 to {ability} saves
if you haven't been hit by an adj creature since your last turn, +5' sp
when crit, 60% chance to nullify extra dmg
your phys-base {weaponClass} hits cannot benefit from any non-phys dmg, but grant your next {weaponClass} hit +1d8 {dmg type} dmg
+3 dmg to {weaponClass} hits with added dmg dice
on sub {weaponClass} hit, give target 1 {dmgType} DoT, stacking until CON save
the first time you atk each combat with a {weaponClass} wep, gain +4 {weaponClass} dmg until end of your turn
on sub {weaponClass} hit, give target 1 {dmgType} DoT, stacking until CON save
-1 dmg res vs adj creatures, and +1d4 {dmgType} dmg to your {weaponClass} hits
the first time you atk each combat with a {weaponClass} wep, gain +2 to your next {ability} save this combat
on succ {ability} save, gain 5 temp HP
on sub hit vs target 30+' away from you, gain +2 {weaponClass} dmg for combat
if you've made a {weaponClass} atk since start of your last turn, +1 crit range

the first time you atk each combat with a {weaponClass} wep, 20% chance for {weaponClass} weps to rain from the sky around the target - make a glyphic {weaponClass} atk against all foes within 5' of the target, including them, dealing 1d4 base type on hit
on crit vs target 30+' away from you, gain 'on crit, debil target until end of target's next turn', for combat
on sub hit vs target 30+' away from you, gain 'on sub hit, give target -2 phys res until end of your next turn', for combat
your AoEs that trigger off of hits have +5' size
your pers areas have +5' AoE sizes
if you've made a {weaponClass} atk since start of your last turn, +1 crit dice
on {weaponClass} atk, '+1 HP healed on crit' until you end a turn having not made such an atk
while you have an active minion, +1 non-phys res
on sub hit, debil target until end of their next turn
on sub minion hit, debil target until end of their next turn
while you have an active minion, +1 phys res
on sub hit, give target -2 {dmgType} res until end of your next turn
on sub hit, give target -1 to debuff saves until end of your next turn
on sub hit, give target sluggish until end of your next turn
when sub hit, energy strikes the foe nearest to you from above, a spell atk dealing 1d4 {dmgType} dmg
while you have an active minion, +2 wep dmg
while you have an active minion, +2 spell dmg
on sub hit, debil target until end of their next turn
on sub hit, make target sluggish until end of your next turn
on summoning a minion, 20% chance to gain +15' sp until end of the turn
your first melee hit each turn deals +1d4 {dmgType} dmg
+1d4 {dmgType} dmg to your minion spell hits
on sub hit, debil target until end of their next turn
on sub minion hit, debil target until end of their next turn
+3 {dmgType} res while you have an active minion
+1 non-phys res while you have an active minion
+1d4 {dmgType} dmg to your minion spell hits
your first melee hit each turn deals +1d4 {dmgType} dmg
on KB vs debuffed target, a random minion of yours heals 5 HP
on KB vs debuffed target, a random minion of yours has its duration refreshed
on KB vs debuffed target, a random minion of yours gains +5 dmg until it dies
on KB vs debuffed target, a random minion of yours gains +5 $nonPhysType dmg until it dies
+2 melee dmg while you have an active minion
on spell cast, 20% chance to call down a bolt of magic on the target, an atk dealing 1d4 spell {dmgType} dmg
when sub hit, make offender sluggish until end of their next turn
when sub hit, give offender -4 {dmgType} res until end of their next turn
when sub hit, give offender -1 to debuff saves until end of their next turn
1/LR, when sub hit, conjure a swirling storm of energy around you for combat, a 5' aura that makes glyphic atks against foes dealing 1d4 {dmgType} dmg on hit
on sub melee hit, call down energy from above on your target, a spell atk dealing 1d4 {dmgType} dmg
your minions have +1 to saves vs debuffs
+2 spell dmg while you have an active minion
on reverting from a shapeshift, +1 dmg res until your next turn
when sub hit, gain +2 phys res until end of your next turn
when sub hit, gain +9 dmg thorns until end of your next turn
when sub hit, gain energy around you which erupts at the end of your next turn, a glyphic atk dealing 1d4 {dmgType} dmg to all adj foes
1/combat, on spellcast, nearest ally heals 2 HP (you choose tiebreaks)
1/combat, on teleport, nearest ally to your origin heals 3 HP (you choose tiebreaks)
1/combat, on spellcast, your nearest minion grows 2 sizes larger until end of its next turn
1/combat, on teleport, nearest minion to your origin grows 2 sizes larger until end of its next turn
1/combat, on spellcast, your nearest minion gets +5 dmg until end of its next turn
1/combat, on teleport, nearest minion to your origin gets +6 dmg until end of its next turn
on sub melee hit, give 1 {dmgType} DoT, stacking until CON save
on sub spell hit, 1 {dmgType} DoT, stacking until CON save
on sub hit, give 1 {dmgType} DoT, stacking until CON save
when sub hit, conjure a Healing Totem, a CR 1/8, immobile construct minion that autohits, deals half dmg, and heals instead of dmging, with 30' range
if your {ability} is 15+ while shapeshifed, +2 melee dmg
+1d4 $dmgType dmg to your minions' melee hits
+1d4 $dmgType dmg to your minions' spell hits
on sub minion hit, give -2 phys res until end of their next turn
if your {ability} is 15+, +3 crit dmg res
on shapeshift, +1 phys res for combat
on shapeshift, +1 global dmg for combat
while you have an active minion, +1 global dmg
while you have an active minion, +1 phys res
if you've shapeshifted this combat, +1 crit range
on shapeshift, +1 crit dice for combat
on sub hit, give 1 {type} DoT, stacking until CON save
on sub minion hit, they give 2 {type} DoT, stacking until CON save

on shapeshift, your minions heal 2 HP
on shapeshift, your active minions gain +2 phys res for combat
on shapeshift, your active minions gain +2 dmg for combat
+1d4 base dmg to your spell hits
+1d4 base dmg to your minion spell hits
your bloodied threshold increases by an amount equal to half your bonus max HP

if you've been hit since your last turn, +2 phys res

on sub hit, inflict target with 1 {type} DoT, stacking until CON save
on sub hit, inflict target with 1 {type} DoT, stacking until DEX save

on sub minion hit, they inflict target with 2 $nonPhysType DoT, stacking until DEX save (minion's DC)

on proj hit, -1 dmg res and +2 global dmg until end of your next turn

if you've been healed since start of your last turn, +1 phys res
if you've been healed since start of your last turn, +1 incoming healing
+1 phys res while holding a shield
if you've blocked since your last turn, +2 global dmg
if you've been healed since start of your last turn, +2 DoT res
if you've been healed since start of your last turn, +3 {type} res
+1 non-phys res while holding a shield
+1 {type} DoT dmg while holding a shield
when hit, +2 melee dmg for combat
on sub block, conjure a ring of shields around you that count as a non-atking CR 1/8 construct minion that always receives atks before you

while holding a 2h {weaponClass} wep, +1 wep dmg

on sub {type} hit, target gets sluggish until end of your next turn

on sub hit, +2 incoming temp HP until end of your next turn
1/combat per unique dmg type, on hit, gain 1 temp HP

if you've scored a $nonPhysType hit since start of your last turn, +1 {type} dmg

if you've summoned a minion this combat, +1 global dmg
whenever an adj creature dies, gain 3 temp HP
on KB, lose 2 HP; +1 global dmg
1/combat, on becoming bloodied, conjure a Revenant, a CR 1/2 undead minion that gains -2 passive regen at the start of each of its turns
on KB, all foes adj to corpse are inflicted with 2 {type} DoT, stacking until CON save
gain minion phys res equal to a quarter of your lvl
on sub hit, inflict target with 1 {type} DoT, stacking until CHA save
+1 DoT dmg per bonus spell dmg

on sub melee hit, target is inflicted with 1 {type} DoT, stacking until DEX save
